sn4.5:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn4.5:2.1: “Muttāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbapāsehi ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
sn4.5:2.2: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, muttā sabbapāsehi ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
sn4.5:2.3: Caratha, bhikkhave, cārikaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
sn4.5:2.5: Desetha, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetha.
sn4.5:2.6: Santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti.
sn4.5:2.8: Ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvelā senānigamo tenupasaṅkamissāmi dhammadesanāyā”ti.
sn4.5:2.9: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
